thread.title: The Guardian Launches New International Homepage
thread.title_full: The Guardian Launches New International Homepage

title: The Guardian Launches New International Homepage
text: Print Page by: Caspar Llewellyn Smith | The Guardian We are pleased to announce the launch of our international homepage, designed for our readers outside the UK, US and Australia. In April this year we began a beta trial of an international edition of our homepage. Since the relaunch of our website earlier this year, our global traffic has grown by almost 20%, with more than two-thirds of our audience coming from outside the UK.
